summary: Standalone Female Redguard Follower in the Combat Assassin class.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#00ffff][color=#00ff00][size=6]
[color=#e69138]Fyre Brimstone
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4217/35003761394_9350ad829a_h.jpg[/img][/color]
[size=5]Redguard female[/size][/size][/color]
[size=4]Class-Combat Assassin
Perks-Lightfoot,Duel Savagery,Bladesman60
Levels with player-Level 2 to 150
Voice-Female Sultry
Essential and Marriageable
Location-Warmaidens in Whiterun[/size][/color][/center]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=3][center]Here goes another follower in my on-going creations. Fyre is a female Redguard in the Combat Assassin class. I don't know how well she will perform but I have confidence in her abilities. She is clothed in traditional Redguard outfit with a scimitar and elven dagger. She will need an upgrade in attire so feel free to armor her up.

I am thankful to the whole Nexus community for using my followers and giving me the feedback on their experiences with them as their followers. I have many more character ideas and I hope that they are accepted as well as my others.

Screenshots and comments are welcome and appreciated so feel free to post them as often as you prefer.

[color=#8e7cc3][size=4]New optional UUNP file added with new face and body textures. TBBP skeleton required.
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4282/35674920612_9b6a4f26c2_h.jpg[/img]
[img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4259/35803367806_a63b32eb6f_h.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/center]

                                                      
                                                    [/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][color=#00ffff]This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/color][/size][/font]
author: lewbob
